name: Joe Will Guess Your Number
description:
It's a NUMBER GUESSING BATTLE between you and Joe. All you need to do is think of a number between 1 and 1000, and Joe will try to guess it! With your help, I guess. A helping number guessing battle

A small game made following the Number Wizard UI tutorial offered by GameDev.tv.

A lot of love was put into the flavor around this little game, and I hope you enjoy it for the tiny bite-sized meal it is.
